languages.text: {n}Техножрец с эмблемой Эксплораторов на алой робе, смотрит немигающим взглядом аугментированных окуляров и шипящим голосом произносит:{/n} "Функционал приветствия инициирован. Слава династии фон Валанциус. Торговый терминал Дзета-42//33-Мю, принадлежащий Эксплораторскому флоту Осознание братства {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, готов к обработке входящих запросов. Озвучьте ваш запрос. Слава Омниссии".

traits.locale_text: {n}Техножрец с эмблемой Эксплораторов на алой робе, смотрит немигающим взглядом аугментированных окуляров и шипящим голосом произносит:{/n} "Функционал приветствия инициирован. Слава династии фон Валанциус. Торговый терминал Дзета-42//33-Мю, принадлежащий Эксплорационному флоту Осознание братства {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, готов к обработке входящих запросов. Озвучьте ваш запрос. Слава Омниссии".
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

languages.text: {n}这位技术神甫穿着猩红色的长袍，佩戴着开拓者徽章，增强型目镜一眨不眨地注视着你。随后，他以嘶哑的声音开了口。{/n}“致意功能已初始化，荣耀属于冯·瓦兰修斯家族。贸易终端泽塔-42//33-缪，隶属于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}真理开拓者舰队，随时准备处理接收到的请求。请说出您的请求。荣耀归于欧姆尼塞亚。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位技术祭司穿着猩红色的长袍，佩戴着开拓者徽章，增强型目镜一眨不眨地注视着你。随后，他以嘶哑的声音开了口。{/n}“致意功能已初始化，荣耀属于冯·瓦兰修斯家族。贸易终端泽塔-42//33-缪，隶属于{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}真理开拓者舰队，随时准备处理接收到的请求。请说出您的请求。荣耀归于欧姆尼塞亚。”
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}緋色のローブに探検の紋章をつけた技術司祭は、拡張された眼球レンズ目を瞬きさせることなくあなたを見つめる。そして、かすれた声で言った。{/n}「挨拶機能開始。フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}コグニサンス探索艦隊の所有物である貿易ターミナルZeta-42//33-Muは要求受理の準備が整いました。要求を述べてください。万機神に栄光あれ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}緋色のローブに探検の紋章をつけた技術司祭は、拡張された眼球レンズ目を瞬きさせることなくあなたを見つめる。そして、かすれた声で言った。{/n}「挨拶機能開始。フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ。{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}コグニサンス探索艦隊の所有物である貿易ターミナルZeta-42//33-Muは要求受理の準備が整いました。要求を述べてください。万機神に栄光あれ」
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}El tecnosacerdote, que lleva un emblema de explorador en su túnica escarlata, te dirige la mirada con sus lentes oculares aumentadas y dice, con voz siseante:{/n} «Funcionalidad de saludo iniciada. Gloria a la casa von Valancius. Terminal comercial Zeta-42//33-Mu, propiedad de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Flota Exploradora Conciencia{/g} del Adeptus Mechanicus, lista para procesar las solicitudes entrantes. Indique su solicitud. Gloria al Omnissiah».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnosacerdote, que lleva un emblema de explorador en su túnica escarlata, te dirige la mirada con sus lentes oculares aumentadas y dice, con voz siseante:{/n} «Funcionalidad de saludo iniciada. Gloria a la casa von Valancius. Terminal comercial Zeta-42//33-Mu, propiedad de la {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Flota Exploradora Conciencia{/g} del Adeptus Mechanicus, lista para procesar las solicitudes entrantes. Indique su solicitud. Gloria al Omnissiah».
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}Der Techpriester, auf dessen roter Robe sich ein Explorator-Emblem befindet, richtet den starren Blick seiner augmentierten Okularlinsen auf dich und sagt mit zischender Stimme:{/n} "Begrüßungsfunktionalität initiiert. Es lebe Haus Valancius. Handelsterminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, Eigentum der Explorator-Erkenntnisflotte des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bereit, eingehende Anfragen zu verarbeiten. Erwarte Eingabe. Ruhm dem Omnissiah."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Techpriester, auf dessen roter Robe sich ein Explorator-Emblem befindet, richtet den starren Blick seiner augmentierten Okularlinsen auf dich und sagt mit zischender Stimme:{/n} "Begrüßungsfunktionalität initiiert. Es lebe Haus Valancius. Handelsterminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, Eigentum der Explorator-Erkenntnisflotte des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, bereit, eingehende Anfragen zu verarbeiten. Erwarte Eingabe. Ruhm dem Omnissiah."
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}Le technoprêtre, qui arborant l'emblème des Explorators sur sa robe écarlate, braque ses lentilles oculaires augmentées sur vous et siffle :{/n} « Démarrage des fonctionnalités de salutation. Gloire à la maison von Valancius. Terminal commercial Zêta-42//33-Mu, propriété de la Flotte de la Connaissance des Explorators de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, prêt à traiter les demandes. Énoncez votre demande. Gloire à l'Omnimessie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technoprêtre, qui arborant l'emblème des Explorators sur sa robe écarlate, braque ses lentilles oculaires augmentées sur vous et siffle :{/n} « Démarrage des fonctionnalités de salutation. Gloire à la maison von Valancius. Terminal commercial Zêta-42//33-Mu, propriété de la Flotte Explorator de la Connaissance de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, prêt à traiter les demandes. Énoncez votre demande. Gloire à l'Omnimessie. »
traits.speaker: FootfallVendorServitor

languages.text: {n}Kızıl cübbesinde bir Keşiftör amblemi taşıyan Tekno Rahip, ogmentli oküler lenslerinden doğrulttuğu kesintisiz bakışlarını sana çevirip tıslama benzeri bir tonla sözlerine başlıyor.{/n} "Selamlama fonksiyonu faal hâle getirildi. Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa. {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Keşiftör Malumat Filosu'na ait ticaret terminali Zeta-42//33-Mu, talep girdilerini işlemeye hazır. Talebinizi belirtiniz. Hermesih yolumuzu açık etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest, who sports an Explorator emblem on his scarlet robe, directs the unblinking gaze of his augmented ocular lenses at you and says, in a hissing voice,{/n} "Salutatory functionality initiated. Glory to House von Valancius. Trade Terminal Zeta-42//33-Mu, property of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} Explorator Cognisance Fleet, ready to process incoming requests. State your request. Glory to the Omnissiah."
